channel.title: The People’s School for Marxist-Leninist Studies
channel.description: The People’s School for Marxist-Leninist studies’ sole goal is to educate the working class to prepare to build socialism. Our team of talented teachers run an interactive classroom focused on openness and clear understanding.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The People’s School for Marxist-Leninist studies’…
channel.itunes:author: PSMLS

item.title: 10 Days That Shook The World by John Reed (pt. 1/3) - PSMLS Audio
item.itunes:author: PSMLS
item.itunes:summary:
We present the first part of a three-part PSMLS series covering comrade John Reed’s book 10 Days That Shook The World (1919). This important text covers the October Revolution in 1917 from an on-the-ground perspective and is an excellent addition to any library. Please enjoy our discussion!
Interested in attending a class? Email info@psmls.org for more information
Purchase a copy of this book through New Outlook Publishers! https://www.lulu.com/en/us/shop/john-...​
Literature Used In This Class:
Introduction To 10 Days That Shook The World by V.I. Lenin https://www.marxists.org/archive/leni...​
10 Days That Shook The World by John Reed (Preface & Chapter 1) https://www.marxists.org/archive/reed...​ https://www.marxists.org/archive/reed...​
Also Referenced In Class:
The Russian Revolution by Marcel Liebman https://kuguxowycij.multdemsvote.com/...​
PSMLS Website:
http://peoplesschool.org/contact/​
Party of Communists USA Website:
https://partyofcommunistsusa.org/about/ ​

item.title: The GDR: Birth, History, and Politics - PSMLS Audio
item.itunes:author: PSMLS
item.itunes:summary:
We have a wonderful class for you: a lesson on the German Democratic Republic taught by Comrade Angelo. Learn of the birth, anniversary, and history of this important place through this lesson conducted 71 years after its inception. Please enjoy!
Interested in attending a class? Email info@psmls.org for more information
No Literature Used In This Class
Recommended Literature on the GDR:
From My Life by Erich Honecker https://archive.org/details/NeoColoni...​
The Neo-Colonialism of the West German Federal Republic: A Documentation https://archive.org/details/NeoColoni...​
We Shall Continue On Our Good Road Of Peace and Socialism : New Year's Message by Walter Ulbricht https://archive.org/details/weshallco...​
The German Democratic Republic Acts In The Interests Of The German Nation https://archive.org/details/germandem...​
PSMLS Website:
http://peoplesschool.org/contact/​
Party of Communists USA Website:
https://partyofcommunistsusa.org/about/

item.title: The DPRK: History And Politics - PSMLS Audio
item.itunes:author: PSMLS
item.itunes:summary:
The Peoples’ School for Marxist-Leninist Studies presents a much-needed lesson on the history and politics of the DPRK. We hope you find it as informative as we did hearing it the first time. Enjoy!
Interested in attending a class? Email info@psmls.org for more information
Literature Used In This Class:
https://www.korea-dpr.com/founding_dp...​
https://www.korea-dpr.com/foundation_...​
Recommended Reading on the DPRK:
This Monstrous War by Wilfred G Burchett https://www.lulu.com/en/us/shop/wilfr...​
Also Visit:
https://www.kfausa.org/​
PSMLS Website:
http://peoplesschool.org/contact/​
Party of Communists USA Website:
https://partyofcommunistsusa.org/about/
